data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 3, At Nabizao, Bragantino are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Corinthians.
Edina Alves Batista awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 10, Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Edina Alves Batista.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Corinthians.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 15, Bragantino pushes forward through Lucas Evangelista, whose finish on goal is saved.
Edina Alves Batista signals a Bragantino throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
In the minute 16, Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Braganca Paulista.
Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 18, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gabriel for Corinthians who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 19, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lucas Evangelista.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Lucas Evangelista is back on the pitch.
In the minute 20, Corinthiansâ€™s Gabriel is on his feet again at Nabizao.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, Free kick Bragantino.
Edina Alves Batista awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Nabizao.
In the minute 24, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 26, Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 27, Bragantino drives forward and Artur gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corinthians's Gabriel has been booked in Braganca Paulista.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Corinthians.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
In the minute 28, The match at Nabizao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Cassio, who is down injured.
Cassio for Corinthians is back on the field again.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 31, Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Edina Alves Batista signals a Bragantino throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Corinthians needs to be cautious. Bragantino have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 33, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Edina Alves Batista.
Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Bragantino.
In Braganca Paulista Corinthians's Jo is caught offside.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Fagner (Corinthians) has received a yellow card from Edina Alves Batista.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Edina Alves Batista awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Corinthians at Nabizao.
Corinthians's Leo Natel gets in a shot on goal at Nabizao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 40, Julio Cesar is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Julio Cesar returns to the field for Bragantino after picking up a slight injury.
Corinthians's Romulo Otero gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Edina Alves Batista signals a Corinthians throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 44, Bragantino's Bruno Tubarao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 45, Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Braganca Paulista.
Corinthians's Romulo Otero is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In the minute 48, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bragantino's Artur breaks free at Nabizao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 50, Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In Braganca Paulista Bragantino attack through Lucas Evangelista. The finish is off target, however.
Edina Alves Batista awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Alerrandro for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Corinthians's Leo Natel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Edina Alves Batista awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Edina Alves Batista.
Important block from the Corinthians defence as Lucas Evangelista fires in a strike for Bragantino.
Bragantino are coming forward and Leo Ortiz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 57, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Braganca Paulista Corinthians drive forward through Luan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 61, Ricardo Ryller of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Corinthians close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 63, Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Corinthians.
In the minute 66, Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
The away team replace Luan with Juan Cazares.
In the minute 67, Coelho is making the team's first substitution at Nabizao with Mauro Boselli replacing Jo.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Corinthians.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Edina Alves Batista awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Corinthians make their third substitution with Gustavo Mantuan replacing Romulo Otero.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
In Braganca Paulista Corinthians attack through Leo Natel. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Edina Alves Batista.
In Braganca Paulista, Danilo Avelar of Corinthians is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 74, Edina Alves Batista signals a Bragantino throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Ryller (Bragantino) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, Corinthians drive upfield and Victor Cantillo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Edimar for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Ramiro is replacing Gabriel for the away team.
In the minute 78, Gustavo Silva is replacing Leo Natel for Corinthians at Nabizao.
Mauro Boselli (Corinthians) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Edina Alves Batista awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Juan Cazares (Corinthians) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corinthians's Victor Cantillo breaks free at Nabizao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 82, Luis Phelipe is on a sub for Bruno Tubarao for Bragantino.
The home team have replaced Ricardo Ryller with Thonny Anderson. This is the second substitution made today by Mauricio Barbieri.
In the minute 83, Corinthians pushes forward through Gustavo Mantuan, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 87, Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Edina Alves Batista awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 89, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Edina Alves Batista.
Edina Alves Batista signals a throw-in for Corinthians, close to Bragantino's area.
Edina Alves Batista signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Corinthians capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Braganca Paulista.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Edina Alves Batista.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
